name: Madame Tussauds Nashville

name: Barrels of Fun Nashville Distillery Winery & Private Tours
reviews: What a great way to spend the day. Everything was perfect! Four great stops, including the winery. Each stop offered plenty of samples combined with great...

name: Bartaco

It's a...

name: Dabble Studio
reviews: We did the walking tour with Elisabeth and would highly recommend this tour. She was very knowledgeable and thoughtful. She was conscientious of our comfort...

name: Hick Chick Tours

name: SoundWaves

name: Arrington Vineyards
reviews: Visiting from out of state and this winery was wonderful. The wine was delicious and the scenery was great. Very beautiful place.
Arrington is definitely not a California vineyard so don't go in with that mindset. It's a beautiful space with ample parking. There are two sides - one has...

name: Defy

name: Plaza Mariachi

name: Soar Adventure Tower

name: Amish Country Market At The Feed Mill

name: Flying Axes

name: Bridgestone Arena

name: Marathon Village

Such a FUN TIME!!

name: Skull's Rainbow Room
reviews:

The food is nice - it is equally pleasant to grab a seat at the bar (if...

name: Local Tastes of Nashville
reviews:

name: Foggy Bottom Canoe Rocks
reviews: We didn't have a problem with them at all.  We have canoed on the Harpeth River before, but with a different company, and this time we tried Foggy Bottom....

name: Opry Mills
reviews:
This is a huge mall! 
It has everything from boot shops in the mall to a bass pro where you could buy anything from a gun to a boat and everything in...
What can I say? It's a mall, one stop shopping and deals around every corner. Parking can be challenging, especially on weekends but that's expected. I love...

name: Musicians Hall of Fame and Museum
reviews: This place is an amazing experience. I enjoyed viewing all the exhibits and being able to read and listen to stories about the evolution of music. There is...

name: The Adventure Park at Nashville
reviews:

name: Acme Feed & Seed

name: General Jackson Showboat
reviews:
My parents are huge fans of lunch and dinner cruises especially when they include live entertainment.

The entire fam drove to Nashville and spent a weekend...

name: Tennessee State Fair
reviews: Very nice event, specially enjoyable having beautiful late fall weather day. A lot of choices to shop for upcoming holiday season. A music was right and...

name: Exit Tactics
reviews: It was a lot of fun and the game master was really nice!  Fun game. Pretty difficult but my group managed to break out of the jail cell game with six...

name: Franklin Farmer's Market
reviews: This farmer's market has become my beloved Saturday morning routine. I also always use this as an excuse to treat myself to coffee at Honest Coffee Roasters...
I was pleasantly surprised with my first visit to the Franklin Farmers market today. Rookie mistake to go on a Saturday at 11am as we had to wait a bit for...
This is my favorite farmer's market I have ever been to. The people are kind, the selection of product and produce and food is wonderful, and I always leave...

name: Grinder's Switch Winery
reviews: My favorite Nashville winery! I love that if I need to pick up some bottles I can at the Marathon Music Works building, or I can go to Centerville to their...

Delicious winery tucked away into the back of an old factory building. They have a sweet and dry category for tasting and a tasting is $5. Their wine...

name: Murfreesboro Axe
reviews: I had a very fun time at the Murfreesboro Axe throwing space. We first had to sign waivers, then were taken into the axe room where the coach gaves us...

name: Rudy's Jazz Room
reviews: Came here for the jazz, and was not disappointed! The added bonus was the food! We had the chicken, andouille, and shrimp gumbo, the red beans and rice, and...

3.5 STARS! We walked in around 1145 to check out a jazz band. The cover charge was $10 and was a fair price. We sat at the bar and had great service to...

name: The Mall at Green Hills
reviews: This mall was really nice and roomy. Was very clean and the crowd was less than expected on a Sunday afternoon. It was only missing one store that we were...
Now that they have added more food options, I can hand over five shiny stars! The new parking garage is a god send and makes getting in and out so much...

Not a bad place to shop, but I wish there was more variety, as a lot of the mall is currently under construction.

There's a wide range of stores, from...

name: Printer's Alley
reviews:
Does anyone remember books or Newspapers?

Well they use to have a very novel thing called a printing press and this Alley was where all the printers use to...

Most people do it for the gram!

It's in an alley with bright flashing lights, multiple bars and restaurants. If you're in the area it's worth a stop and a...

I was expecting a bigger crowd but there was not much going on here.

They have bars and...

name: High Tide Rides
reviews: Booked this cruise for a bachelorette party (flew in from AZ!). There was 7 of us girls and we all had a great time. Meant to leave review when got home but...

name: Beaman Park Nature Center
reviews:

There are two entrances to the trails and both have...

Our family was looking for a quiet place to hike and we found it at Beaman Park. Enjoyable trails and the stream was wonderful. Just enough waterfall for...

name: Crossroads Ranch
reviews: Crossroads is a great facility that welcomes beginners as well as experienced horsemen to their ranch. All of the horses are well cared for and loved by...

name: Tennessee State Museum
reviews: First off, it's free. That said, don't expect to find parking if there's anything going on, you're going to be parking on the other side of Bicentennial...
It's big.  It's free.  Parking is easy.  Good collection of items and information from prehistoric to modern times.
On the second floor at the Tennessee State Museum you get to see the history of Tennessee from millions of years ago and how the landscape of the state was...

name: Higher Pursuits
reviews:
Just finished a wonderful float down the Duck River.  
This is a 1st class operation & we will come back again. 
Thank you for making our excursion so easy!!!!
What a treat to have Higher Pursuits near our backyard! We have floated several times with this great company. Jan is so helpful with knowledge about boats...
Great experience kayaking with our family today! Price was good and we were able to take our time for the day. The drop and pick up locations were fairly...
